identity.name: Ecommify Campaign Calculator
identity.vision: A mobile-first command center for e-commerce elites. Dark, focused, and data-dense.

headings.usage: Page titles, big metrics, shop names

navigation.style: Fixed bottom, backdrop-blur-xl, border-t border-[#2d2d44] bg-[#0f0f1a]/90

login.style: Centered grid of circular or large rectangular buttons. minimalistic.

dashboard.structure: Tabs (Shops) -> Month Nav -> KPI Cards -> Daily List
dashboard.kpi_cards: Minimalist, big numbers, trend indicator small below.

kanban.card_style: Flat #1a1a2e bg, left colored border for priority.

visual_enhancers.shadows: shadow-none (flat tech look) or shadow-2xl for floating elements like modals
visual_enhancers.micro_interactions: Active scale-95 on buttons, smooth fade-in for page transitions

setup: Add 'Barlow Condensed' to index.html from Google Fonts.
Install 'framer-motion' for transitions if not present.
Configure 'tailwind.config.js' with the custom colors defined in 'colors' section.
implementation_rules: Ensure all currency values (PLN) are formatted with 'toLocaleString' and use tabular-nums.

The layout must be responsive. On Desktop, the bottom nav should possibly switch to a Sidebar or Top bar, or remain as a 'Mobile App on Web' feel if requested (user said 'Mobile-first'). Strict to mobile-first usually implies keeping the app-like feel.
Use 'recharts' for any trend lines in the Dashboard.
Data-Test-IDs are MANDATORY for all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, cards).

files_to_create_or_modify.index.css: Add base styles for html/body to force dark mode background.
files_to_create_or_modify.components/ui: Customize Shadcn components to remove excessive rounding and use the border color #2d2d44.

UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: 'transition: all'. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms.
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add '.App { text-align: center; }' in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style.
NEVER: use AI assistant Emoji characters like ðŸ¤–ðŸ§  etc for icons.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions, parallax effects, and entrance animations. Static = dead.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable. Cramped designs look cheap.
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays, custom cursors, selection states, and loading animations: separates good from extraordinary.
Main agent relies on these image URLs. Missing categories = main agent will use placeholder text which is FORBIDDEN.
Prioritize using pre-existing components from src/components/ui when applicable.
Components MUST use named exports (export const ComponentName = ...).
Pages MUST use default exports (export default function PageName() {...}).
